Keywords: Monster , X-Men
Real Name: Robert Herman
Special Powers
WATCH YOU BURN: Poison. When Glob Herman uses it and deals damage to an opposing character, you may give him an action token. If you do, give all adjacent opposing characters an action token.
OMEGA GANG ENFORCER: Charge, Plasticity. // Glob Herman deals penetrating damage to adjacent characters. (Including with Poison).

muel0017
[QUOTE=Dortmuner;12102185]Clarifying a pronoun here: “[B]WATCH YOU BURN:[/B] Poison. When Glob Herman uses it and deals damage to an opposing character, you may give him an action token. If you do, give all adjacent opposing characters an action token.” That first “him” refers to Glob, right? Not the poisoned character. You may give Glob an action token and if you do, you give all adjacent opposing characters an action token. Or is it that you give the character Glob poisons an action token and also one to all opposing characters to that poisoned character? Surely it’s the former. I just know it’s going to come up in our games.[/QUOTE] Yes, this is referring to him. not the poisoned character.
January 14, 2021
Dortmuner
Clarifying a pronoun here: “[B]WATCH YOU BURN:[/B] Poison. When Glob Herman uses it and deals damage to an opposing character, you may give him an action token. If you do, give all adjacent opposing characters an action token.” That first “him” refers to Glob, right? Not the poisoned character. You may give Glob an action token and if you do, you give all adjacent opposing characters an action token. Or is it that you give the character Glob poisons an action token and also one to all opposing characters to that poisoned character? Surely it’s the former. I just know it’s going to come up in our games.
December 3, 2020
Coyote's Own
No Knockback damage is caused by knockback, not the attacking character. and rules question are better asked in rules section.
December 3, 2020
JDHCR
Is damage caused by falling or hitting a wall during an attack by a character who "deals penetrating damage" also penetrating? It doesn't say with an attack, it says "Glob Herman deals penetrating damage to adjacent characters. (Including with Poison)." So if I knock someone back into a wall and they are still adjacent to me, do they take penetrating damage?
